description: This file defines API route handlers for team management features, including CRUD operations for teams and team members, with associated Swagger API documentation annotations.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET requests to retrieve list of teams accessible to the authenticated user.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles HTTP POST requests to create a new team; requires admin privileges.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET requests to retrieve a specific team by its ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles HTTP PATCH requests to update a team's details.

methods.name: archive
methods.description: Handles HTTP DELETE requests to soft delete (archive) a team.

methods.name: listMembers
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET requests to list members of a team.

methods.name: addMember
methods.description: Handles HTTP POST requests to add a member to a team.

methods.name: removeMember
methods.description: Handles HTTP DELETE requests to remove a member from a team.

methods.name: changeMemberRole
methods.description: Handles HTTP PATCH requests to change a member's role within a team.
